attributes.title: Official Trailer
attributes.caption: Created in the world of Minecraft, Survive Block Island brings new meaning to the word REALITY, but has all the drama of a COMPETITION. This weekly series premieres April 7, 2022.
attributes.description:
Created in the world of Minecraft, Survive Block Island brings new meaning to the word REALITY, but has all the drama of a COMPETITION. This weekly series premieres April 7, 2022.

About Survive Block Island:
In this brand new Rooster Teeth reality competition premiering, 12 gamers are stranded in the world of minecraft with one objective… survival. Two teams are put to the ultimate test and must work together through weekly challenges in hopes of winning immunity. The losers are forced to vote off the weakest link. The last player standing will be crowned the champion. Alliances will be made. Friendships will be tested. Watch and find out who will Survive Block Island.

attributes.title: Welcome to Block Island
attributes.caption: 12 Competitors are welcomed to Block Island by host Trevor Collins who divides the group into two teams, Red vs. Blue.
attributes.description: 12 Competitors are welcomed to Block Island by host Trevor Collins who divides the group into two teams, Red vs. Blue. The competitors familiarize themselves with their teammates looking for allies at basecamp before heading to the Firestarter Challenge. The losing team must then face the Chopping Block, where the unthinkable happens.

attributes.title: The Meat Shield
attributes.caption: The 11 remaining competitors strategize amongst their respective teams before heading to the Spleef Challenge.  The losing team is forced to make a tough decision at yet another shocking Chopping Block.
attributes.description: The 11 remaining competitors strategize amongst their respective teams before heading to the Spleef Challenge.  The losing team is forced to make a tough decision at yet another shocking Chopping Block.

attributes.title: Lava Wall
attributes.caption: 10 Competitors advance to play another OG Minecraft Challenge, Lava Wall.
attributes.description: 10 Competitors advance to play another OG Minecraft Challenge, Lava Wall.  The losing team must head back to camp and strategize on who should be eliminated.  And ultimately another unlucky competitor meets their demise at the chopping block.

attributes.title: Teams Divided
attributes.caption: Teams are switched up as 9 competitors move on to compete in the Rainbow Relay Challenge.  New strategies and alliances must be made before the losers head to the Chopping Block.
attributes.description: Teams are switched up as 9 competitors move on to compete in the Rainbow Relay Challenge.  New strategies and alliances must be made before the losers head to the Chopping Block.

attributes.title: Treasure Trove of Trust
attributes.caption: 8 Competitors remain and are now evenly divided between Yellow versus Green.  The teams square off in the Buried treasure challenge, and the losers must again decide who will be eliminated at the Chopping Block.
attributes.description: 8 Competitors remain and are now evenly divided between Yellow versus Green.  The teams square off in the Buried treasure challenge, and the losers must again decide who will be eliminated at the Chopping Block.

attributes.title: Helmet of Kingdoms
attributes.caption: Things get shaken up yet again as the teams merge!  The 7 remaining Competitors test their mental muscles in the Memory Challenge for the much coveted Helmet of Kingdoms which provides safety from the Chopping Block.
attributes.description: Things get shaken up yet again as the teams merge!  The 7 remaining Competitors test their mental muscles in the Memory Challenge for the much coveted Helmet of Kingdoms which provides safety from the Chopping Block.

attributes.title: Kiss of Death
attributes.caption: The opportunity to find and use a totem comes to an end.  The 6 remaining competitors must now rely solely on their skill and ability to navigate the Jump Course for a chance at immunity from the Chopping Block.
attributes.description: The opportunity to find and use a totem comes to an end.  The 6 remaining competitors must now rely solely on their skill and ability to navigate the Jump Course for a chance at immunity from the Chopping Block.

attributes.title: Carrots and Potatoes
attributes.caption: Pressure mounts on the 5 remaining competitors as they face what is arguably one of the most difficult challenges in the Crystal Maze, and the OG Red Team must eliminate one of their own.
attributes.description: Pressure mounts on the 5 remaining competitors as they face what is arguably one of the most difficult challenges in the Crystal Maze, and the OG Red Team must eliminate one of their own.

attributes.title: The Final Four
attributes.caption: The remaining four competitors face off in the Riddle Relay for one last shot at safety from the final Chopping Block.  The season comes to an end when a winner is decided by a jury of their peers!  Make sure to stick around to the end of the credits (wink wink)...
attributes.description: The remaining four competitors face off in the Riddle Relay for one last shot at safety from the final Chopping Block.  The season comes to an end when a winner is decided by a jury of their peers!  Make sure to stick around to the end of the credits (wink wink)...

attributes.title: Survive Block Island: The Reunion
attributes.caption: We allowed the contestants of Survive Block Island to leave the island just for this panel! Can everyone get along after weeks of betrayal?  What was it like being stuck on the island? What is the future of SBI? Found out only at RTX!
attributes.description: We allowed the contestants of Survive Block Island to leave the island just for this panel! Can everyone get along after weeks of betrayal?  What was it like being stuck on the island? What is the future of SBI? Found out only at RTX!
attributes.display_title: S1:E10 - Survive Block Island: The Reunion
